addQuestionDialog.reviewDateInfo: This date is automatically calculated based on the selected difficulty level.

deleteConfirmDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the question

helpDialog.title: Algorithm Question Tracker - Help
helpDialog.description: This application helps you track your algorithm questions and reinforce your learning through regular reviews.

generalInfo.aboutText: This is a tool that tracks algorithm questions as you solve them and applies a smart repeat system based on difficulty level.
generalInfo.interfaceTitle: The interface consists of three main sections:

interfaceItems.item2: List of questions to be reviewed today

generalInfo.dataStorageText: All your data is stored in your browser's localStorage. This means that the data will only remain on the device you are using. If you switch to a different device or browser, your data will not appear there.

questionManagement.addingText: You can add a new question by clicking the + button in the top right. You need to enter the following information for each question:
questionManagement.editingText: You can update or remove questions using the edit and delete buttons on the right side of each question.
questionManagement.deleteWarning: The deletion operation cannot be undone.

reviewSystem.howItWorksText: The application works on a spaced repetition logic. Review dates are automatically determined according to difficulty level:
reviewSystem.reviewAppearText: When the review date comes, the question appears in the "Questions to Review Today" list.
reviewSystem.markingText: When you review a question, check the checkbox next to it. Marked questions are shown with a green background to indicate they have been reviewed.
reviewSystem.accidentalMarkText: If you mark by mistake, you can uncheck it by clicking again.
reviewSystem.dailyResetText: Review statuses are only valid for that day and reset at the end of the day.

helpDialog.footerText: This application is designed to help make your algorithm studies more systematic. Regular reviews will increase the effectiveness of your learning process.

footer.copyright: Algorithm Question Tracker - All data is stored in your browser
